CustomField.description: moved calculation to formula since there is no longer need to summarize List_Price__c of all of the assets
CustomField.formula: (IF(ISNULL(Opportunity__r.Payment_Amount__c) || ISNULL(Opportunity__r.Equipment_Cost__c), IF(ISNULL(Opportunity__r.X_Rate_Factor__c), 0, Opportunity__r.X_Rate_Factor__c) , Opportunity__r.Payment_Amount__c/Opportunity__r.Equipment_Cost__c) ) * IF(ISNULL(List_Price__c), 0 , List_Price__c) * IF(ISNULL(Opportunity__r.of_Payments__c), 0 , Opportunity__r.of_Payments__c)
CustomField.label: Asset Rental Amount
